questions.question: Do you understand supervised vs unsupervised learning?
Are you familiar with common ML algorithms (linear regression, decision trees)?
Have you worked with data cleaning and preprocessing?
Have you used ML libraries like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch?
Do you know how to evaluate model performance (accuracy, precision, recall)?
Have you done feature selection and engineering?
Have you built neural networks or deep learning models?
Have you deployed ML models to production?
Do you understand overfitting and how to prevent it?
Have you built end-to-end ML pipelines?
